section_1.description: Brij Concept is one of the leading ordering and delivering Q-Commerce (the next generation, e-commerce) service providers in India, bringing small quantities of goods to customers almost instantly wherever and whenever they need them, within the borders of the selected city. We aim to process millions of orders per day in the coming years. The commerce can occur as business to business  (B2B), business to consumer (B2C), consumer to consumer or consumer to business.

section_2.title: Our Idea
description: From Daily necessities to household good, pastries to sweets, pharmaceutical to groceries, from something as small as a cumin seed to something as large as a good of 5kg with volume less than or equal to 5 cu ft.
At Brij Concept we care and our work ethics, agile riders, customer support, operations, infrastructure and easy to go technology enable our customers to commerce with us at lowest costs.
We have made it as our duty to make your life tranquil, unexacting and simpler by delivering rapidly, easy and at your doorstep.

description.title: Basic:
description.description: In Basic we offer a platform which enables our customers to schedule the pickups in the given time slots while offering them flexibility through delivery time choices and uncomplicated payment options.

description.title: Express:
description.description: In Basic we offer a platform which enables our customers to schedule the pickups in the given time slots while offering them flexibility through delivery time choices and uncomplicated payment options.

description.title: Gifts @ 12 in the midnight:
description.description: Everyone cherishes the surprise birthday gifts and midnight celebrations. So, surprise your loved ones with our gifts @ 12 in the midnight service and enjoy the ritual of gifting your loved ones on special occasions, without stepping out of your comfort zones at minimal cost.

data.title: Integrity
data.description: The organisation upholds the integrity of the highest order while being honest and possessing stong moral principles in providing services to the customers.

data.title: No minimum Order
data.description: There's no bar set for minimum order. We will be at your doorstep with the same probity and passion receiving and delivering even a grain of wheat.

data.title: Convenience
data.description: With the best in class, easily accessible technology and cash in hand service available, we try to make our customer's life fulfilling and satisfactory with our services.

data.title: Safety comes First
data.description: We recognise the faith you put in us amidst Covid-19 outbreak. That's why we want to let you know we are taking every possible measure to keep you and our team members protected.

data.title: Commitment
data.description: We are completely fanatical about receiving and delivering on our commitments.

team.name: Vipul Srivastava
team.description: We at Brij Concept  thrive to make our customers lives easier and comfortable with an affective value proposition and management system. We aim and commit to uphold the integrity of the highest order while fulfilling the needs of our customers.

team.name: Amir Shaikh
team.description: At the tender age of 17, Samarth is on the forefront of innovation, pushing the limits, developing the best in class technology and aims to provide a platform to millions through Brij Concept, making it a pre-eminent quick commerce service providers in India.
